hero.name: Juan Carlos
hero.subtitle: Web Developer building accessible applications with JavaScript and TypeScript.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Web Developer
about.description: I'm Juan Carlos, a Business Technology student at UIS and a Cloud Application Development apprentice at SENA. I build reliable web applications using JavaScript and some of its frameworks.
about.journey: I focus on understanding web development fundamentals; this lets me learn new technologies faster, avoid depending on a single framework or library, and deliver more robust solutions to real problems.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of the projects I've worked on, showcasing my skills in various technologies and frameworks.

timeToFocus.title: Time To Focus
timeToFocus.description: A real-time Twitch bot integrating Spotify and OpenWeather APIs with bidirectional WebSocket communication. Features include OAuth authentication, rate limiting, and a configurable Pomodoro timer managed via chat commands.

vetCare.title: Vet Care
vetCare.description: Comprehensive veterinary management system featuring a React frontend and Node.js REST API. Includes secure JWT authentication, role-based access for users and veterinarians, and a MySQL database managed with Sequelize.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.description: My professional portfolio built with React and TypeScript, featuring a responsive design and performance optimizations. It demonstrates my ability to write clean, maintainable code and implement a minimalist UI.

api-auth.title: Authentication API
api-auth.description: Secure login and registration system using Node.js, PostgreSQL, and JWT, featuring robust middleware for request validation.

dragonBall.title: Dragon Ball API
dragonBall.description: Responsive character information viewer leveraging an external API, built with React and Tailwind CSS.

cafeYamara.title: Caf√© Yamara
cafeYamara.description: Coffee shop management app implementing the Repository Pattern and JWT authentication. Optimized with Next.js for server-side rendering, achieving a First Contentful Paint under 3 seconds.

stack.title: Technologies
stack.subtitle: Core technologies I use for web development.
stack.learningDescription: I consistently improve my skills by reading documentation, building practical projects, and exploring new development tools.

microsoftAzure.title: Azure Fundamentals
microsoftAzure.description: Microsoft Azure cloud fundamentals, core services and architecture.

googleCloud.title: Google Cloud Digital Leader
googleCloud.description: Digital leadership in Google cloud, digital transformation and cloud strategy.

awsCloudPractitioner.title: AWS Cloud Practitioner
awsCloudPractitioner.description: Fundamental concepts of Amazon Web Services and cloud best practices.

ibmDataScience.title: IBM Data Science Professional
ibmDataScience.description: Professional data science with Python, machine learning and statistical analysis.

platziJavaScript.title: Git & GitHub
platziJavaScript.description: Comprehensive training in version control with Git and collaborative workflows using GitHub. Covered branching strategies, pull requests, code reviews, and professional teamwork for robust software development in real-world projects.

minticProgramming.title: Basic Programming Bootcamp
minticProgramming.description: Intensive 159-hour bootcamp in a live virtual format. Built a strong foundation in full-stack web development, mastering JavaScript, Python, HTML, and CSS, and applying agile methodologies to create practical, real-world projects from scratch.

minticProgrammingIntermediate.title: Intermediate Programming Bootcamp
minticProgrammingIntermediate.description: Intensive 159-hour bootcamp in a live virtual format. Advanced training in modern web development: built interactive apps with React, implemented backend architectures with Node.js and Express.js, and managed relational databases using SQL.

ibmCybersecurity.title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
ibmCybersecurity.description: Intensive program on cybersecurity principles, including threat groups, attack types, cryptography, and organizational security. Developed practical skills to identify, prevent, and respond to digital threats in modern environments.

awsDevOps.title: DevOps on AWS and Project Management
awsDevOps.description: Comprehensive overview of project management in business, exploring Agile and Waterfall methodologies, and hands-on implementation of DevOps practices on AWS for efficient, collaborative, and scalable software delivery.

footer.description: Open to internship and collaboration opportunities.
footer.availability: Available for freelance work and collaboration opportunities.
footer.styledWith: Styled by Juancho with Tailwind CSS
